subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which battles were fought between Rana Kumbha and Akbar?
question_hi: राना कुम्भा और अकबर के बीच कितने हिल हुए थे?
A_en: First Battle of Alwar and Second Battle of Mewar
B_en: Second Battle of Alwar and First Battle of Mewar
B_hi: दूसरा अलवार और समाज के लिए स्पष्ट हुए
C_en: First Battle of Alwar and Second Battle of Mewar
D_en: First Battle of Alwar and Third Battle of Mewar
explanation_en: The correct sequence of battles was the First Battle of Alwar and the Second Battle of Mewar. The Third Battle of Mewar took place between the Marathas and Mughals, not related to Rana Kumbha and Akbar.
explanation_hi: सही पृथियां पहले अलवार और दोनों मेवार हैं। तीनों मेवार मंत्री और मुगोलों के बैरां पर हैं।
